content: Yes, ferry companies that prioritize safety and offer additional safety measures like life jackets and emergency procedures can be a good choice, especially if you're traveling with family or small children. When choosing a ferry company, it's always a good idea to prioritize safety and consider factors like the condition of the vessels, safety equipment on board, and the training of the crew.  So, if you find a ferry company that provides additional safety measures, it's definitely worth considering.
